page.title: 10LIFE STYLES - 50 YEARS AGO
page.content: Alford 50 years ago. In{1935}it was very quiet in Alford. All the children went to one school which is where the present{John {Spendluffe}is, except for some boys who went to the{Grammar school. The{market place}was only a little different but had posts and chains around it.There was a market every Tuesday and Friday with{Banana Bob, {Rock King, fruit stalls etc.}Shops generally were much smaller and there were more family shops. My Grandma lived in a small country house with{no electricity, gas, piped {water or sewerage.}Her jobs were a {housemaid and a waitress.}For entertainment she went to the picture house at Enderby sale room.The special trip of the year was to{Mablethorpe}on a wagon pulled by horses. The railway then went through Alford.
